summary: An examination of the heavy metal music subculture that tries to explain why, despite the longevity and popularity of the genre, fans are marginalized and ridiculed for their passion.
cast: Tom Araya|Gavin Baddeley|Blasphemer|Randy Blythe|Joe Bottiglieri|Eric Bryan|Jackie Chambers|Monte Conner|Alice Cooper|Denis D'Amour|Pamela Des Barres|Bruce Dickinson|Ronnie James Dio|Malcolm Dome|Rose Dyson|Robert Ezrin|George Fisher|Gaahl|Donna Gaines|Angela Gossow|Sam Guitor|Ihsahn|Tony Iommi|Thomas Jensen|Rob Jones|Joey Jordison|Keith Kahn-Harris|Robert Kampf|John Kay|Lemmy|Kerry King|Grutle Kjellson|Chuck Klosterman|Mercedes Lander|Morgan Lander|Michel 'Away' Langevin|Geddy Lee|Kim McAuliffe|Tom Morello|Mark Morton|Necrobutcher|Vince Neil|Ivar Peersen|Doro Pesch|Martin Popoff|Rolf Rasmussen|Samoth|Joey Severance|James 'Munky' Shaffer|Brian Slagel|Dee Snider|Corey Taylor|Eddie Trunk|Jørn Tunsberg|Robert Walser|Alex Webster|Deena Weinstein|Rob Zombie|Al Gore|Tipper Gore|Ernest F. Hollings|Barry Pinto|Chris Adler|Einar Darri|Sam Dunn|Hellhammer|Ingo|Varg Vikernes
director: Directors: Sam Dunn, Scot McFadyen | 1 more credit »
title: Metal: A Headbanger's Journey
